TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1291
TEI.2.document_title: Walter C. White to Stephen F. Austin, 03-20-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1291

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Statement of account.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To Sloop Mexican and owners Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-16-1826">Feby 20th*/date_mentioned* To 16 days hire of said Sloop @ $4______________________ 64.00*/p*
*p*86 lb Salt @ 6 cts—____________________________________ 5.16*/p*
*p*13 Gallons Rum @ 1.25__________________________________ 16.25*/p*
*p*85.41*/p*
*p*Cr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-21-1826">Feby 21st*/date_mentioned* By 4 Bushels Corn Meal @ 1.33J___________________5. 33*/p*
*p*100 lb Beef @ 5 cts lb_____________________________5.00*/p*
*p*------- 10.33*/p*
*p*$75.08*/p* *p*Recd Payment by a credit on *person_mentioned*Knight*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*White*/person_mentioned*s note *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20 March 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Walter C. White */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
